files.description: Public configuration package API that exposes load/merge/validate helpers and default configuration factories for the evconv workflow.
Core configuration models and utilities including deep-merge logic, normalization, and deterministic hashing for config objects.
Configuration I/O layer supporting reading/writing YAML/JSON, environment-variable overrides, and resolving relative paths safely.
Reusable plotting configuration utilities including default style presets, validation of plotting options, and conversion to matplotlib kwargs.
End-to-end configuration workflow orchestrator that composes defaults, loads user configs, applies overrides, validates, and returns a final config bundle.
Tests covering the full configuration workflow including default assembly, file loading, deep-merge behavior, overrides, validation, and plotting config integration.

missionDescription: Refactor and modularize reusable code artifacts: 2025-12-28T00-41-21-451Z_src_evconv_config_init_py_stage1_attempt1_prompt.txt, 2025-12-28T00-41-21-451Z_src_evconv_config_init_py_stage1_attempt2_prompt.txt, 2025-12-28T00-41-21-451Z_src_evconv_config_plotting_py_stage1_attempt2_prompt.txt, 2025-12-28T00-41-21-451Z_tests_test_config_workflow_py_stage1_attempt1_prompt.txt, 2025-12-28T00-41-21-451Z_tests_test_config_workflow_py_stage1_attempt2_prompt.txt
